long_description: The Merrell Whetstone sweater features both natural and synthetic fibers including wool and angora for softness, resiliency and cozy warmth. One wear and it'll definitely be your new favorite. Fabric blend of wool, nylon, viscose, cotton and angora is naturally insulating and breathable. Half-zip opening adds ventilation. Closeout.
short_description: The Merrell Whetstone sweater features both natural and synthetic fibers including wool and angora for softness, resiliency and cozy warmth. One wear and it'll definitely be your new favorite.
